overview: RAGING STALLION STUDIOS' worldwide family of premier film companies very proudly presents the latest testament to testosterone brought to you by the house that international muscle built, JD SLATER'S CENTURION PICTURES XXX: CENTURION MUSCLE 4 'EROTIKUS'. A heart-stoppingly real, truly intimate study of the 'mega homo erectus,' captured at his most passionate and powerful primal heat. This is a monument to all who lust after monster-dicked mountains of massively buffed heroes of hoochie, the ones who stride like giants and rut like pigs.
title: Centurion Muscle 4: Erotikus
